There are frequent buses along the Panamerican Highway. Colectivos are usually large old American cars, which when full go from
by Las Tortugas Beach Cove & on to
Colectivos  & motor-cycle taxis can be hired to take you to the Sechin site & museum.

Cerro Sechin archaeological site & Museo Max Uhle are 5km SE of Casma. Hundreds of Monoliths depict victorious warriors & their mutilated enemies at a site that dates from 1600BC, & lies below Cerro Sechin, which gives a commanding view over the Casma Valley.
